text: (Dutare,) navu pratiyondu samudayada kuritu saksiyagi avarolagindale obba vyaktiyannu ebbisuva dina, avarellara kuritu saksiyagi nim'mannu munde taruvevu. Ella visayagalannu vivarisuva granthavannu (kur‌an‌annu) navu nimage ilisikottiruvevu – idu saranagiruvavara palige margadarsiyu anugrahavu subhavarteyu agide
